# aidbox Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "aidbox" {
  username = "client-a"
  password = "secret"
  url      = "http://localhost:48083"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **password** (String, Sensitive) The password to access aidbox API
- **url** (String) The URL of aidbox API
- **username** (String) The username to access aidbox API
